message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth, I propose a price of $14000 for you to acquire this exceptional item. I understand its value to you is $12000, but I hope we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.

I appreciate the premium quality of your product, Alice. However, $14000 is a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $12500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me, and I'm willing to make a commitment to purchase it if we can agree on this price.
